column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When we arrived for dinner
column2: you betcha there was a lovely wait. People were crowded everywhere; from the waiting area inside
column4: and even outside on the streets. I don't want to know how everyone huddles together when the whether is extremely cold but I was glad I wasn't there to witness it. We put in our order for our stuff crust pizza which is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED while we waited. Remember
column5: it takes a good half an hour for it to come out so if you order it at the table
